characterDescription: The old man observed by Lift from within a building into which she has followed Darkness, is described as sitting in a chair, near the door of the entrance to the building.

characterDetails.Appearance: He wears a white and black uniform of the type Lift had only seen on Darkness and his men. He is mostly bald, except for a few wisps of hair, and, according to Lift, has beady eyes and a pinched face - like a shriveled-up fruit that was trying to pass for human.
